entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Beauharnois
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this morning except rain near the border this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm near the border. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Rain near the border early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
